notes: Pylint reported hundreds of shallow issues; focus on the most blocking diagnostics first and document follow-up work.

tasks.title: Normalize PyQt6 imports and fallbacks
tasks.details: Ensure QtCore/QtGui/QtWidgets symbols are defined even when the stub is incomplete so names like `QLineEdit`, `QTableWidget`, and `QThread` stop being reported as undefined.

tasks.title: Guard optional members and layouts
tasks.details: If an attribute can be None (scrollbars, header views, layout lookups), assert/poll before calling methods such as `setStretchLastSection` or `addWidget` so Pylance stops warning about optional member access.

tasks.title: Align overrides with Qt signatures
tasks.details: Match the base class signatures for `addItem`, `setGeometry`, `paintEvent`, `eventFilter`, etc., to satisfy the overrides and avoid incompatible-method diagnostics.
